languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, прежде чем покинете Футфол, хочу передать официальную {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}ноту благодарности{/d} от своей инстанции. Имперский флот ценит династию фон Валанциус как верного соратника — позвольте же подтвердить нашу признательность! Не откажите в чести принять скромный объем припасов, которые поддержат вашу смелую экспедицию".

"Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, before you leave Footfall, I would like to present you with an official {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}statement of gratitude{/d} from my organisation. The Imperial Navy values House von Valancius as loyal comrades-in-arms — allow us therefore to reiterate our grateful appreciation! Please do us the honour of accepting a modest quantity of supplies to support your courageous expedition."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, прежде чем покинете Футфол, хочу передать официальную {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}ноту благодарности{/d} от своей инстанции. Имперский флот ценит династию фон Валанциус как верного соратника — позвольте же подтвердить нашу признательность! Не откажите в чести принять скромный объем припасов, которые поддержат вашу смелую экспедицию".

traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: “大人，在您离开落脚港之前，我想向您呈上一封来自帝国海军的{d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}正式感谢信{/d}。帝国海军将冯·瓦兰修斯家族视为忠诚的战友，因此，请允许我们再次向您表达我们的感激之情！请您赏光接受我们提供的补给品，希望我们能为您的无畏远征贡献一份力量。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, before you leave Footfall, I would like to present you with an official {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}statement of gratitude{/d} from my organisation. The Imperial Navy values House von Valancius as loyal comrades-in-arms — allow us therefore to reiterate our grateful appreciation! Please do us the honour of accepting a modest quantity of supplies to support your courageous expedition."

traits.locale_text: “大人，在您离开落脚港之前，我想向您呈上一封来自帝国海军的正式感谢信。帝国海军将冯·瓦兰修斯家族视为忠诚的战友，因此，请允许我们再次向您表达我们的感激之情！请您赏光接受我们提供的补给品，希望我们能为您的无畏远征贡献一份力量。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: 「陛下、フットフォールを去る前に、私の組織から公式の{d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}感謝の言葉{/d}を贈らせてください。帝国海軍はフォン・ヴァランシウス家を、忠実な同胞として重視しております。是非私達に、感謝の気持ちを繰り返しお伝えさせてください！御身の勇気ある遠征を支援したいのです。どうか、このささやかな物資を受け取っていただきたい」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, before you leave Footfall, I would like to present you with an official {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}statement of gratitude{/d} from my organisation. The Imperial Navy values House von Valancius as loyal comrades-in-arms — allow us therefore to reiterate our grateful appreciation! Please do us the honour of accepting a modest quantity of supplies to support your courageous expedition."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、フットフォールを去る前に、私の組織から公式の{d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}感謝の言葉{/d}を贈らせてください。帝国海軍はフォン・ヴァランシウス家を、忠実な同胞として重視しております。是非私達に、感謝の気持ちを繰り返しお伝えさせてください！御身の勇気ある遠征を支援したいのです。どうか、このささやかな物資を受け取っていただきたい」
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, antes de que abandone Paso me gustaría brindarle {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}la mayor de las gratitudes{/d} por parte de mi organización. La Armada Imperial tiene en alta estima a la casa von Valancius como leales camaradas en las armas. ¡Permítanos recalcar nuestro agradecimiento y aprecio! Por favor, concédanos el honor de aceptar una modesta cantidad de suministros para que le sirvan de ayuda en su valiente expedición».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, before you leave Footfall, I would like to present you with an official {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}statement of gratitude{/d} from my organisation. The Imperial Navy values House von Valancius as loyal comrades-in-arms — allow us therefore to reiterate our grateful appreciation! Please do us the honour of accepting a modest quantity of supplies to support your courageous expedition."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, antes de que abandone Paso me gustaría brindarle con la mayor de las gratitudes por parte de mi organización. La Armada Imperial tiene en alta estima a la casa von Valancius como leales camaradas en las armas. ¡Permítanos recalcar nuestro agradecimiento y aprecio! Por favor, concédanos el honor de aceptar una modesta cantidad de suministros para que le sirvan de ayuda en su valiente expedición».
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, bevor Ihr Footfall verlasst, möchte ich Euch eine offizielle {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}Dankeserklärung{/d} meiner Organisation präsentieren. Die imperiale Kriegsflotte schätzt das Haus Valancius als treue Waffenkameraden. Gestattet uns daher, unserem Dank erneut Ausdruck zu verleihen! Bitte erweist uns die Ehre, eine bescheidene Menge an Vorräten für Eure Mutige Expedition zu akzeptieren."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, before you leave Footfall, I would like to present you with an official {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}statement of gratitude{/d} from my organisation. The Imperial Navy values House von Valancius as loyal comrades-in-arms — allow us therefore to reiterate our grateful appreciation! Please do us the honour of accepting a modest quantity of supplies to support your courageous expedition."

traits.locale_text: "Euer {mf|Lord|Lady}schaft, bevor Ihr Footfall verlasst, möchte ich Euch eine offizielle Dankeserklärung von meiner Organisation präsentieren. Die imperiale Kriegsflotte schätzt das Haus Valancius als treue Waffenkameraden. Gestattet uns daher, unserem Dank erneut Ausdruck zu verleihen! Bitte erweist uns die Ehre, eine bescheidene Menge an Vorräten für Eure Mutige Expedition zu akzeptieren."
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, avant que vous ne quittiez Castel, permettez-moi de vous transmettre les {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}remerciements officiels{/d} de mon organisation. La Marine Impériale considère les membres de la maison von Valancius comme de loyaux compagnons d'armes. Nous vous réitérons toute notre gratitude ! Ce serait pour nous un grand honneur de vous offrir une quantité modeste de matériel pour soutenir votre expédition. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, before you leave Footfall, I would like to present you with an official {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}statement of gratitude{/d} from my organisation. The Imperial Navy values House von Valancius as loyal comrades-in-arms — allow us therefore to reiterate our grateful appreciation! Please do us the honour of accepting a modest quantity of supplies to support your courageous expedition."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, avant que vous ne quittiez Castel, permettez-moi de vous transmettre les remerciements officiels de mon organisation. La Marine Impériale considère les membres de la maison von Valancius comme de loyaux compagnons d'armes. Nous vous réitérons toute notre gratitude ! Ce serait pour nous un grand honneur de vous offrir une quantité modeste de matériel pour soutenir votre expédition. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_SpaceVendor

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Binliman'dan ayrılmanızın öncesinde organizasyonumun {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}minnettarlığını{/d} resmî olarak ifade etmek isterim. İmparatorluk Donanması, von Valancius Hanesi'ni sadık bir silah arkadaşı olarak görmekte, bu sebeple de şükranlarımızı yeniden vurgulamamıza müsaade edin! Lütfen çıkacağınız bu cesaret isteyen keşif seferine desteklerimizi sunmak için hazırladığımız mütevazı miktarda erzakı kabul ederek bizi onurlandırın."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship, before you leave Footfall, I would like to present you with an official {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}statement of gratitude{/d} from my organisation. The Imperial Navy values House von Valancius as loyal comrades-in-arms — allow us therefore to reiterate our grateful appreciation! Please do us the honour of accepting a modest quantity of supplies to support your courageous expedition."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Binliman'dan ayrılmanızın öncesinde, organizasyonumun {d|Encyclopedia:FleetRep_Max}minnettarlığını{/d} resmî olarak ifade etmek isterim. İmparatorluk Donanması, von Valancius Hanesi'ni sadık bir silah arkadaşı olarak görmekte, bu sebeple de şükranlarımızı yeniden vurgulamamıza müsaade edin! Lütfen çıkacağınız bu cesaret isteyen keşif seferine desteklerimizi sunmak için hazırladığımız mütevazı miktarda erzakı kabul ederek bizi onurlandırın."
